name: Block Runner (MrStubby)
description:
Get through the levels and fight some crazy bosses or just try to beat your high score in endless mode in this bullet hell type of a game! Stuff may happen or change when its least expected! You will never know what's next. Levels and soon boss stats are randomly generated. Give it a shot!

See release note, changelog and more here on my blog!

RoadMap

Game is under heavy development and stuff have bugs and be subject to change! 

I love to hear your ideas as this is my first public game!
